msg.msgText: A write operation failed on a message object body or on a message object property because the message was in read only state.

msgExplanation.p: A write operation on a message object body or on message object properties is permitted only when the message body or properties are writable.

msgUserResponse.p: The clearBody() method clears the message body and makes the message writable. The clearProperties() method clears message properties and makes them writable.
